About This Project

Weather Forecast Application

A modern, real-time weather application built with Next.js 15, React 19, and TypeScript. Get accurate weather forecasts with beautiful, dynamic backgrounds that change based on current weather conditions and time of day.

Features

  • ▹Real-time weather data from WeatherAPI.com
  • ▹3-day weather forecast
  • ▹Hourly temperature predictions
  • ▹Dynamic backgrounds based on weather conditions (day/night)
  • ▹Search any city worldwide
  • ▹Responsive and mobile-friendly design
  • ▹Beautiful UI with Tailwind CSS

Technologies Used

  • ▹Next.js 15 - React framework with App Router
  • ▹React 19 - Latest version with improved performance
  • ▹TypeScript - Type-safe development
  • ▹Tailwind CSS 4 - Modern utility-first CSS
  • ▹Axios - HTTP client for API requests
  • ▹Lucide React - Beautiful icon library
  • ▹WeatherAPI.com - Weather data provider

Weather Conditions

The application displays different background images based on:

  • •Clear sky (day/night)
  • •Sunny conditions
  • •Cloudy weather (day/night)
  • •Overcast conditions (day/night)
  • •Rainy weather (day/night)
  • •Snow (day/night)
  • •Storms and thunder (day/night)

How It Works

  1. 1.Enter a city name in the search box
  2. 2.The app fetches real-time weather data from WeatherAPI
  3. 3.Background automatically changes based on weather and time
  4. 4.View current temperature, conditions, and forecasts
  5. 5.See hourly predictions and 3-day forecast

Built with ❤️ using modern web technologies

Weather data provided by WeatherAPI.com
